flawed_nl_solution:
Toby has 60 friends because 33 / 0.55 = <<33/0.55=60>>60
49% of his friends are girls because 100 - 55 = <<100-55=49>>49
He has 29.4 friends who are girls because 60 x 0.49 = <<29.4=29.4>>29.4
#### 29.399999999999995

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45, not 49. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
